titleStmt.title: Aurora Ismenia and the prince: by Don Juan Perez de Montalvan. Oronta the Cyprian virgin: By Signr. Girolamo Preti. Translated by Thomas Stanley Esq;
Aurora, & the prince.
titleStmt.author: Pérez de Montalván, Juan, 1602-1638.
Preti, Girolamo, 1582-1626. Oronta.
Stanley, Thomas, 1625-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson for Humphrey Moseley at the sign of the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first English edition (Wing P1467) title reads: Aurora, & the prince.
Oronta has a separate divisional title page, and separate pagination; register is continuous.
"As the Oronta was included in the Poems 1651 (pp. 181-194), sheet H was omitted in those copies of the present which were issued appended to the larger collection"--Pforzheimer catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-yard
